tool_description: An API showing climate changes from all around the world
name: Climate Change Live _ AT
title: Climate Change Live _ AT

api_list.name: Specific Source Weather Changes
api_list.description: Get all weather news from a specific source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-_-at.p.rapidapi.com/news/theguardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-_-at.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-_-at.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return climate changes from all over the world
